title: Layered Horror Ambience Sound Pack
description: 150 spine-tingling audio weapons await you in this ultimate arsenal of fear. Craft endless variations of nightmarish soundscapes with 60 pre-made horror ambiences and 90 dynamic layers, all designed by seasoned sound wizards.
longDescription:
150 spine-tingling audio weapons await you in this ultimate arsenal of fear. Craft endless variations of nightmarish soundscapes with 60 pre-made horror ambiences and 90 dynamic layers, all designed by seasoned sound wizards. Build tension like a maestro, layering whispers, creaks, and unsettling murmurs to make your players squirm in their seats. Fear not, a handy guide awaits to help you navigate this sonic haunted house. Unleash the chills with Layered Horror Ambience Pack.


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 60 Designed Horror Ambiences (ready to use)

⦿ 90 Layered Horror Ambiences (used together to build up tension)


Layered Horror Ambience Sound Pack is mostly used in Horror, Dark, Survival, Action Horror, Stealth Horror, Psychological Horror, FPS Horror, and Atmospheric Horror games. 


Designed and multilayer audio tracks are perfect for use in game engines and will help you create a truly immersive horror experience. Don't let your game or project fall flat - add the Layered Horror Ambience Sound Pack to your audio library today!
